txt.en: 'This information should be useful for any future forays and as a warning to those who might wander too closely to this place.\n\n'Your work has saved the lives of our peoples, and I cannot thank you enough.'
Ghâr Mejet is a vile place within the underground. Explore its chambers and report on your findings.
Ghâr Mejet is a vile place within the underground. Explore its chambers and report your findings to Yâshri.

'We do not know much about Ghâr Mejet. While we know the restless dead haunt this place, we have yet to explore the area more closely.\n\n'Could a capable adventurer such as yourself explore its chambers and report on your findings?'
The main chamber of Ghâr Mejet is the vilest place in the area. Explore its chambers and report on your findings.
Talk to Yâshri outside of Ghâr Mejet
